channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP-Board
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP-Board

item.title: CVE-2021-24404|2024-08-03T19:28:23.928Z -- unknown -- wp-board
item.description: The options.php file of the WP-Board WordPress plugin through 1.1 beta accepts a postid parameter which is not sanitised, escaped or validated before inserting to a SQL statement, leading to SQL injection. This is a time based SQLI and in the same function vulnerable parameter is passed twice so if we pass time as 5 seconds it takes 10 seconds to return since the query ran twice.
